title: ASPI ME by Steve Gibson
description:
Follow these directions to use this program.


In order to use this program to add the proper aspi layer for all drives, since Adeptec sued Steve Gibson in 1998 for using their drivers without their

permission, and he was forced to discontinue this program, although it can still be used by setting your computer date to any month or day in the year 1998,

then make sure any anti-virus and real time scanner is turned off, then run the program and follow the directions, if you forget to disable your anti-virus,

it will either delete the program or move it to your Virus chest, in any event it will block it, so don't forget this important step.


   Steve Gibson always intended to make another aspi layer program using his own drivers, but he was recruited by the FBI to fight cyber-terrorism, and has 
since dropped his plan to do it.


   But if you follow these easy directions, this program will install the proper aspi layer and/or fix any corrupted aspi layer that your computer may have.


   If you are interested in the whole story, visit:  <a href=" http://www.grc.com/aspi_me.htm" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.grc.com/aspi_me.htm</a>
